usage:
`$ping`
Get the delay to the bot.

`$usage {COMMAND}`
Gives the usage of a command.

`$code {CODE} {NA, EU, ASIA}`
Sets your active voice channel to the code and region.

`$mute` or `$m`
Toggle mute and deafen everyone in the active VC

`$dead` or `$d`
Unmutes and undeafens you. Use this if you are dead and want to talk to other dead players.
